name: Crystal B.
text: We order Marco's almost once a week  and I gave this a good rating before. We ordered a move and it didn't show up unavailable on the website correctly, and instead of calling us, they just gave us a random different movie instead. After ‚Ä¶More

name: Thomas Baker
text: They are no longer open in Maplewood officially closed at 9pm 5/22 good bye old friend it was good working with you.

name: Bob Lovelace
text: Our Favorite Pizza Place now Closed in Maplewood

name: Rick Downs
text: Marco's is the best pizza for the price. Looking at their corny logo you would never think that they would have some delicious pizza. Right when you walk in the staff greets you. When you pick up pizza they will always show it to you to ‚Ä¶More

name: Marisol Ramey
text: Prices are good not too expensive.Definitely looking forward to be back and try other pizza.

name: Thomas Ferguson
text: Visited Marcos today. This specific location in Maplewood I connected to a family video which is different from the one I am used to which shut down recently. I ordered online which I always suggest to people because you can always make the ‚Ä¶More

name: Rebecca K.
text: This is the best delivery pizza place around.   They have the most courteous staff and drivers and extremely fast delivery.  I've never had an incorrect order.   The food is always hot, fresh and delicious.   A+!!

name: Kelli Stanford
text: Nice customer service and good food

name: Joann Conaway
text: Love their pizza... I eat more pizza now then when I owned my own Pizza store....I couldn't order from mine, it was to far away....

name: Elizabeth French
text: I haven't really enjoyed pizza for a long time. However, after years of everything from mediocre to truly godawful excuses for pizza, Marco's may just be the one to bring me back into the fold. First time and everything was right. The crust ‚Ä¶More

name: chris Lampe
text: Called in a pickup , waited 25 minites and walked in to the worker on the phone taking a personal call and I'm standing there for 5 plus minutes while she keeps on talking not paying attention to her job...i call up there for a manager ‚Ä¶More

name: jennifer fox
text: Love this place! Employees are great and food is fantastic! My family refers to Marcos as the Triple Threat Pizzeria because we NO longer go to Domino's, Pizza Hut, and one attempt at Little Caesars....So glad Maplewood has one  awesome Pizza joint!

name: Chiquita Brown
text: Food is very delicious. Fast service and very friendly employees. I recommend Marco over other pizza places...

name: Elin Asvaldsdottir
text: Fantastic service, great tasting pizza. Super friendly manager. Great deals even time.

name: Tony Morris
text: Steak and onion with extra cheese...best pizza out there.

name: Steven Kirkham
text: My first job was at a pizza restaraunt, and I have always been fiercely loyal to that chain...that is until I tried Marco's. I have no issue with saying that they make some of the best pizza that you will find in the Midwest, and for a very reasonable price.

name: Gabby Hernandez
text: Love this place. Always great service and food!

name: Stacey Rolof
text: Fast delivery, friendly driver, delicious pizza, and good prices. Marco's is about the same price as Dominos but is much better!

name: Really Though
text: Very friendly, fast, delicious, and reasonable priced. My new go to for pizza.

name: Jewel Cannida
text: Very good fresh hot moist pizza!!!!

name: corrina sanders
text: Usually I'm ok with the pizza but it was super oily and the oil came out the box and in my car. It looks like some one put a pound of oil on the pizza. I didn't feel like bringing it back just threw it away ...

name: AJ Sullivan
text: The only place I‚Äôll go for pizza

name: Zach Berghoefer
text: Decent price, pretty good for what you pay for.

name: Robert Boesing
text: Called to order a pizza for lunch, was told driver just left on a long run would be over an hour before they could deliver, Suggestion get another driver if your that busy!

name: Call me Contact
text: Tasty pizza

name: Randi Nicole
text: Love their pizza and wings!! Always a family favorite!

name: Jay King
text: I love Marcos üçï!!!

name: Samuel DiLorenzo
text: Kids liked it, I did not

name: carey robinson
text: 2 1/2 hours and still waiting for 2 pizzas this is  ridiculous I should have ordered somewhere other than marco's pizza!!!
